snippet: Jimmie Johnson pulled away on a restart with eight laps to go and won the Nascar Sprint Cup Series race at Martinsville Speedway in Virginia on Sunday.
abstract: Jimmie Johnson wins Nascar Sprint Cup Series race at Martinsville Speedway in Virginia.
lead_paragraph: Jimmie Johnson pulled away on a restart with eight laps to go and won the Nascar Sprint Cup Series race at Martinsville Speedway in Virginia on Sunday.

headline.seo: Victory on Familiar Track for Jimmie Johnson
headline.main: Victory on Familiar Track for Johnson
